title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Eurofighter Typhoon - free download until 23-05-2021!!!
description:
In this video we will have a look at the Eurofighter Typhoon created by Brekod3d and is available for free for a limited time. The current version of the aircraft is version 1.1.

The Eurofighter Typhoon is the worldâ€™s most advanced swing-role combat aircraft providing simultaneously deployable Air-to-Air and Air-to-Surface capabilities.The Eurofighter Typhoon is a European twin-engine, canard delta wing, multirole fighter. The Typhoon was designed originally as an air superiority fighter and is manufactured by a consortium of Airbus, BAE Systems and Leonardo that conducts the majority of the project through a joint holding company, Eurofighter Jagdflugzeug GmbH. NATO Eurofighter and Tornado Management Agency manages the project and is the prime customer.

If you would like to give the addon you can get it for free until 23/05/2021 via the link below:
https://secure.simmarket.com/informatica-az-eurofighter-typhoon.phtml
